lyrics:
"Like I Used 2" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Like I Used 2" [Verse 1:] I like a bitch that like to hustle, all my bitch fuck with is hustle I'm too gangsta for a boojy bitch, oh shit I think the rubber bust I'm too turnt up, yo bitch she just can't get enough And you can learn some so lil nigga listen up I was livin in my bitch crib true story And if I seen a bigger no set, I keep for it Niggas rap about what I do, cause I live And if a wrong going right I know that Flocka gon ride with me I let bullets fly cause rappers fly and sabotage this When they up a blocka then you best get out of dodge bullets Fore you beef with Gucci you will rub the beef with Godzilla And I know you live with er, now and then I still hit er [Hook:] I can't fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 Wish I could fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 She can't suck a nigga dick like she used 2 Wish she can suck a nigga dick like she used 2 Wish I could fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 I can't fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 She can't suck a nigga dick like she used 2 Wish she can suck a nigga dick like she used 2 [Verse 2:] I'm not them ordinary niggas that you used to A better chance hittin that lottery that bein me I'm so picky, I may never find a wife (it's Gucci) Don't think they'll ever make another nigga like me Screamin so I see out and even though what ice is Who's ballin hard? Payin car, no it's a line bitch I didn't have a job but the work still had tax still 47 that boulder, crystal house where the pack live Bout 10 park apartment where the roaches and the rats live I don't respect money nigga, I respect real Put yo ass kill over motherfuckin addled The young niggas with me poppin mollies like they Advil [Hook:] I can't fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 Wish I could fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 She can't suck a nigga dick like she used 2 Wish she can suck a nigga dick like she used 2 Wish I could fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 I can't fuck a nigga bitch like I used 2 She can't suck a nigga dick like she used 2 Wish she can suck a nigga dick like she used 2 if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('

'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Xavier L. Dotson, Radric Davis AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Trap Back 2" (2013) Dont Deserve It Family Tree Playin With The Money Thirtsy Crush Hood Bitches Like I Used 2 Cant Walk Dumb Fine That Pack Crazy Things Iron On Me Done With Her Full Of It Picture That James Worthy White Man Search
